import React from 'react' import * as Yup from "yup" import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from "formik"; function CreatePost() { const initialValues={ title:"", postText:"", username:"" } const onSubmit=(data)=>{ console.log(data) } const validationSchema=Yup.object().shape({ title }) return (
) } export default CreatePost
